00013 const UINT8 ADXL345_I2C::kAddress;
00014 const UINT8 ADXL345_I2C::kPowerCtlRegister;
00015 const UINT8 ADXL345_I2C::kDataFormatRegister;
00016 const UINT8 ADXL345_I2C::kDataRegister;
00017 const double ADXL345_I2C::kGsPerLSB;
00018 
00025 ADXL345_I2C::ADXL345_I2C(UINT32 slot, ADXL345_I2C::DataFormat_Range range)
00026     : m_i2c (NULL)
00027 {
00028     DigitalModule *module = DigitalModule::GetInstance(slot);
00029     if (module)
00030     {
00031         m_i2c = module->GetI2C(kAddress);
00032 
00033         // Turn on the measurements
00034         m_i2c->Write(kPowerCtlRegister, kPowerCtl_Measure);
00035         // Specify the data format to read
00036         m_i2c->Write(kDataFormatRegister, kDataFormat_FullRes | (UINT8)range);
00037     }
00038 }
00039 
00043 ADXL345_I2C::~ADXL345_I2C()
00044 {
00045     delete m_i2c;
00046     m_i2c = NULL;
00047 }
00048 
00055 double ADXL345_I2C::GetAcceleration(ADXL345_I2C::Axes axis)
00056 {
00057     INT16 rawAccel = 0;
00058     if(m_i2c)
00059     {
00060         m_i2c->Read(kDataRegister + (UINT8)axis, sizeof(rawAccel), (UINT8 *)&rawAccel);
00061 
00062         // Sensor is little endian... swap bytes
00063         rawAccel = ((rawAccel >> 8) & 0xFF) | (rawAccel << 8);
00064     }
00065     return rawAccel * kGsPerLSB;
00066 }
00067 
00073 ADXL345_I2C::AllAxes ADXL345_I2C::GetAccelerations()
00074 {
00075     AllAxes data = {0.0};
00076     INT16 rawData[3];
00077     if (m_i2c)
00078     {
00079         m_i2c->Read(kDataRegister, sizeof(rawData), (UINT8*)rawData);
00080 
00081         // Sensor is little endian... swap bytes
00082         for (INT32 i=0; i<3; i++)
00083         {
00084             rawData[i] = ((rawData[i] >> 8) & 0xFF) | (rawData[i] << 8);
00085         }
00086 
00087         data.XAxis = rawData[0] * kGsPerLSB;
00088         data.YAxis = rawData[1] * kGsPerLSB;
00089         data.ZAxis = rawData[2] * kGsPerLSB;
00090     }
00091     return data;
00092 }
